item.title: Platform Engineering Antipatterns
item.description:
Platform Engineering Antipatterns Link to heading

You are probably already on your path to implementing platform engineering in your company. Maybe it was triggered by a major cloud transformation or a significant overhaul of your software development practices. Perhaps you embarked on this journey because youâ€™ve been struggling with DevOps or SRE practices. You are thinking platform engineering is loved, cherished and promoted by the industry, so, there must be something to it?
